features: 【318 in 1 Survival Kits】Emergency kit is a must-have for every family to prepare for some unforeseen events. We really do the thinking of your needs, and design this professional and practical survival first aid kit, that contains total 318pcs survival gear and equipment, including 13 multipurpose survival tools and 22 types of essential emergency medical supplies. Make it easy for you to handle the unexpected emergencies.

【High-quality Survival Gear and Equipment for Camping or Home Needs】 The survival first aid kit offers high-quality and professional tactical survival tools to ensure you will be well-prepared under any emergencies. The kit contains: 14 in 1 hatchet, folding shovel and pick, collapsible tent lantern, tactical flashlight, survival bracelet,multi-tool card, fire starter, emergency blanket, 12-hour glow stick, wire saw, and emergency rain poncho.

【Comprehensive First Aid Supplies for Emergency Medical Needs】Total 305PCS emergency medical supplies are packed in the first aid kit. It includes essential items such as tweezers, scissors and pins, would pad, bandage triangulaire, CPR mask, compresses for burn, cotton balls, cotton swabs, a generous supply of bandages,wipes, etc. Perfect for taking care of any medical or emergency needs during outdoor wilderness adventures or disaster.

【Upgraded MOLLE Bag, Compatible and Portable】 The survival kits with an high-capacity molle pouch which is made of 1000D nylon, sized 10*6.7*4.5inches. All tactical gear and medical supplies are well arranged in the molle pouch, you can get what you need easy and quickly. There is still room to put some items you need. It's lightweight and easy to carry, you can attach it to your tactical vest ,backpack, or belt. Suitable for camping, hiking, backpacking, travel, and other outdoor activities.

【Versatile and Widely Applicable, Perfect Gift Ideas】This survival first aid kit is suitable for car travel, camping, hiking, cycling, backpacking, as well as daily life in home and office. It’s a practical survival medical tool kit that everyone deserves to own, making it an ideal gift for men, dad, husbands, women, kids. It is also a nice gift for various holidays such as Valentine's Day, Christmas, birthday, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What's Included: 13 Multipurpose Survival Tools,22 Types of Eseential First Aid Supplies,Be Prepared for the Unexpected Emergencies! The 318PCS survival first aid kit contain everything you need during an emergency. When go out for camping,the tactical tools, like folding knife, 14 in 1 hatchet, folding shovel and pick, wire saw, can help you build a shelter. When go for a wild adventure,collapsible tent lantern,tactical flashlight, 12-hour glow stick, emergency blanket, fire starter, can help you keep warm and light, can be used to call for help in emergencies. Would pad, bandage triangulaire, CPR mask, compresses for burn, cotton balls, cotton swabs, a generous supply of bandages,alcohol pad,all these first aid supplies maximum coverage for essential medical needs, can help you deal with those unexpected injuries. All of these must-have emergency essentials are packed in an organized bugout bag.

Three Practical Multipurpose Survival Tools, Perfect Partner of Camping Hiking Fishing, Other Outside Activities Collapsible Tent Lantern The lantern is designed with 30 energy-efficient LED for 360 degree lighting . Use 3 AA batteries (not included), easily lights up the entire tent or room. It's a perfect companion for camping, hiking, fishing, and wild adventure. 14 in 1 Hatchet The hatchet contains 14 practical camping tools including axe, hammer, saw, pliers, assorted hex wrenches, screwdriver, bottle opener, fish descaler and more, with a durable sheath. It's made by heavy duty stainless steel that strong enough to cut, pry, twist the screw, open fire hydrant, saw wood etc. Folding Shovel and Pick It's a strong and practical tool, that can be pressed into service as a shovel, saw, bottle opener, nail puller, hoe, pickaxe and more! It's also a great emergency tool you can keep in car to clear snow in an emergency, during the winter.
Upgraded MOLLE Pouch, Made of 1000D nylon, Has Dual Zippers & Interior Organization with Tree-Fold Designed, Great Bugout Bag for Outdoor Activities

Perfect Gift Choice Easy to use and carry, suitable for drawer,car, ship,bike, ect. Can be put in backpack, attached to belt,convenient for you at any time in your daily life or outdoor activities. Ideal gifts for men women who like outdoor activities such as camping, hiking, cycling, fishing. Cool and unique gift for men, dad, husband, grandpa, boyfriend, son, or Women for Christmas stocking stuffer, birthday, holiday.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars has everything you need.
reviews.reviewText: this emergency kit has everything you need, from medical supplies, to an axe, to rope, etc. it comes in a think, canvas-like material bag that seems extremely durable.hopefully ill never have to actually use it for said emergency, but better safe than sorry! 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with my survival kit. The tools seem sturdy and there’s plenty of first aid equipment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little bit of everything
reviews.reviewText: Great Kit, works well for any expolorer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect gift for your outdoor person! It is nicely compacted with all kinds of helpful items if you’re camping, hiking, or just for a survival bags!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Safety on the road
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my niece and nephew to keep in their car. Winters can get wild in Iowa, so wanted them to have some gear to help them survive. I will be very happy if they never have to use any of it.My only problem with it is I hate those stupid multi-tool hatchets. They are pretty much garbage and just jack up the price. I would prefer a regular hatchet and a regular multi-tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The knife was missing a piece and broke.
reviews.reviewText: Overall this was a great buy. I like the range of products inside. The pocket knife was cheap and missing a screw as it fell apart when I opened it up. I’m glad that I have the kit for my car as I am in my car every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great survival pack and will be a good fit for the trail

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything you might need for a small bug out bag.
reviews.reviewText: Cheap way to have a lot of great survival stuff on hand!
